description_for_human: Verifiable AI skill safety classification with zero-knowledge ML proofs
description_for_model: Classify AI agent skills as SAFE/CAUTION/DANGEROUS/MALICIOUS with mandatory cryptographic zkML proof. POST skill data to /api/v1/evaluate ($0.001 USDC via x402 on Base). Verify proofs free at POST /api/v1/verify. Every response includes a SNARK proof certifying the classification was computed correctly.
